reviewText: Ordered as a Christmas gift so no can review. 'Twas specifically requested so presume receiver-to-be had positive familiarity.

I saw this on Netflix and couldn't find it until recently. A single man in Eugene Oregon makes glass pot pipes. This is about artistic creativeness , how far can glass be stretched ,reformed ,colored and heated to an unlimited variation of a simple for.

This was an accurate of what is going on in the world of pipe making. It demonstrated what fantastic artists are involved in this
ART FORM. Too bad they are not recognized as the artists they are.
